H3.text: what team did howie long. Oakland Raiders

A4.text: He played 13 seasons with the Raiders franchise.

A5.text: He was selected by the Raiders in the second round of the 1981 NFL draft, spending his first season with the team in Oakland and the remainder of his career in Los Angeles.
